document_title: Correction for Boothby et al., Evidence for extensive horizontal gene transfer from the draft genome of a tardigrade
summary_full: This document is a correction to a previously published paper titled "Evidence for extensive horizontal gene transfer from the draft genome of a tardigrade." The correction addresses an issue with the data deposition footnote, which linked to an outdated version of the genome assembly. The authors provide a new, updated link to the correct version of the assembly used in their paper, which has been uploaded to GitHub.
key_findings: The original genome assembly used in the paper is available at a new GitHub repository.
The previous data deposition footnote contained a link to an outdated assembly version.
related_papers: Boothby et al., Evidence for extensive horizontal gene transfer from the draft genome of a tardigrade (10.1073/pnas.1510461112)
conclusions: The authors have corrected a data accessibility issue by providing an updated link to the genome assembly used in their study, ensuring the reproducibility of their findings on horizontal gene transfer in tardigrades.
impact_statement: This correction ensures the scientific community has access to the correct data for verifying and building upon research into tardigrade genomics and horizontal gene transfer.
